mapper.select: SELECT id,name,resUrl,type,parentId,sort FROM resources ORDER BY sort ASC

SELECT re.id,re.name,re.parentId,re.resUrl,re.type, (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM role_resources rr WHERE rr.resourcesId=re.id AND rr.roleId=#{rid}) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) AS checked FROM resources re WHERE re.parentId !=0 ORDER BY re.sort ASC
